messages.content: What is the purpose of ComfyUI-TCD-scheduler custom node repository?
The purpose is to implement Zheng et al.'s Trajectory Consistency Distillation based on the tcd project.
Which nodes does the custom node repository add?
It adds TCDScheduler, SamplerTCD Euler A, and SamplerTCD nodes to the Custom Sampler category.
How can you start using the custom nodes?
You can start using them by cloning the repository into your custom_nodes folder and restarting ComfyUI.
Is SamplerTCD fully functional?
No, SamplerTCD is a work in progress (WIP) and currently only operates as DDIM with no gamma parameter.
What is recommended to use instead of SamplerTCD?
It is recommended to use SamplerTCD Euler A for the time being.
What is the special parameter of LCMScheduler and what does it control?
The special parameter is 'gamma', which controls the stochasticity in every step.
What does the gamma parameter represent when set to 0 and 1?
When gamma is set to 0, it represents deterministic sampling, and when set to 1, it indicates full stochastic sampling.
What is the default value of the gamma parameter?
The default value is 0.3.
What is recommended when increasing the number of inference steps?
It is recommended to use a higher value for the gamma parameter when increasing the number of inference steps.
Who helped with converting from sigmas to timestep and SamplerTCDEulerA?
@laksjdjf helped with converting from sigmas to timestep and SamplerTCDEulerA.
Where can I learn more about samplers and schedulers?
For learning more about samplers and schedulers, you can check the article at https://www.felixsanz.dev/articles/complete-guide-to-samplers-in-stable-diffusion.
